analysis.description:
Reentrancy in DeskBellPresale.finalize (/unique_chucks/21/0x6e776e93291620dac8f3dde4a0b98c42a5359293.sol):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/21/0x6e776e93291620dac8f3dde4a0b98c42a5359293.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/21/0x6e776e93291620dac8f3dde4a0b98c42a5359293.sol)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x6e776e93291620dac8f3dde4a0b98c42a5359293.sol#419-424) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x6e776e93291620dac8f3dde4a0b98c42a5359293.sol#420-424)
